pages.text:
Event Spaces
At Mana Wynwood, we provide flexible production capabilities that can cater to events of any scale.
Explore each unique space, find your perfect match, and elevate your experience.
Mana Wynwood Convention Center
This full-service convention center is the crown jewel of the Mana Wynwood campus, offering a spacious 100,000 sq ft air-conditioned facility and on-site parking. Split into two distinct rooms – the Event Hall and the Sound Stadium – it’s the perfect canvas for your next event.
Rent a space
Download floor plan
White Room
Event Hall
The Event Hall is the epitome of versatility, making it an ideal choice for trade shows, fashion shows, corporate events, gala dinners, weddings, and cultural events.
Venue Specs
Room Size:
50,000 sq ft
Ceiling Height floor top roof
:
29′ 11″ ft
Ceiling Height floor to joist:
27′ 11″ ft
Capacity:
Approx. 5,000 standing
Black Room
Sound Stadium
The Sound Stadium is your go-to venue for music festivals, concerts, performances, gala dinners, weddings, corporate events, and cultural events.
Venue Specs
Room Size:
40,000 sq ft
Ceiling Height floor top roof:
30′ 1″ ft
Ceiling Height floor to ceiling tiles:
26′ 1″ ft
Capacity:
Approx. 4,000 standing
Coming soon
Mana Wynwood @ RC Cola
The former RC Cola Bottling Factory in Wynwood is being transformed into a world-class entertainment and culture venue, Mana Wynwood @ RC Cola, with plans to house various event and hospitality concepts in the 100,000-square-foot facility.
Learn more
New Venue
Mana Wynwood 320
Mana Wynwood 320 promises to revolutionize entertainment and cultural engagements. Formerly known as Le Rouge, this multifaceted venue is ideal for intimate corporate functions and private gatherings.
For more information, please email
[email protected]
or call
(305) 573-0371
.
Venue Specs
Room Size:
6,472 sq ft
Ceiling Height:
16′ 5″ ft
Capacity:
500 people standing capacity in the empty room, subject to production
Lookbook

Types of Events
Unleash limitless event possibilities at Mana Wynwood in Miami. With our versatile venues as a blank canvas, your vision comes to life. Explore our diverse range of events and get inspired to host your own unforgettable experience.
Art Exhibitions
Centered upon a mural-filled landscape in the Wynwood Arts & Entertainment District, the Mana Wynwood convention center has previously hosted some of the world’s leading art fairs including
Spectrum
,
Red Dot
,
Pinta Art Fair
, and many others. Our facilities offer a blank canvas that is the perfect location for any art exhibitor.
Community Events
Whether you’re hosting a food festival, political rally, trade show, or any event that brings together members of the community, our facilities can accommodate your needs. Situated on 30 acres, our multi-use campus offers a plethora of venue options nestled in the heart of Miami’s arts & entertainment district.
Concerts & Music Festivals
From live bands to DJs, jazz to hip hop, large-scale musical festivals to intimate piano recitals, our spaces allow musical artists from all over the world to showcase their talents.
Corporate & Business Conferences
Looking for a space to host your next business conference or event? We have numerous venue options, both indoor and outdoor, to help conceive the perfect event for your organization. With an abundance of hotels, dining experiences, and nightlife surrounding our property, Mana Wynwood provides a chart-topping destination for your attendees.
Private Events
Are you looking to throw a next-level birthday party? Searching for a unique wedding venue? We have a versatile space designed to accommodate anything from very intimate to large group events.
Types of Events
Unleash limitless event possibilities at Mana Wynwood in Miami. With our versatile venues as a blank canvas, your vision comes to life. Explore our diverse range of events and get inspired to host your own unforgettable experience.

About Mana Wynwood
Since 2010, Mana Wynwood has been a cornerstone of Wynwood’s identity as Miami’s Arts and Entertainment District. Our
multi-use properties and event venues
have hosted thousands of events,
spanning the entire spectrum of cultural activities
. From art shows and music festivals to concerts, cultural celebrations, political rallies, business conferences, technology showcases, and charitable events, Mana Wynwood has been the backdrop for unforgettable experiences.
But Mana Wynwood is more than just a venue. It’s a canvas for artistic expression, showcasing
dozens of the largest and most prominent murals
and transforming the neighborhood into one of the world’s largest outdoor art museums. Artists from all corners of the globe are drawn to the large-scale canvas that Mana Wynwood provides, allowing them to bring their mural creations to life.
Our revitalization efforts have positioned Mana Wynwood as a top tourist destination in Miami and propelled the Wynwood neighborhood onto the world stage. Experience the transformative vision of Moishe Mana that has solidified Wynwood and made Mana Wynwood a pillar of cultural vibrancy and innovation.
About Mana Wynwood
Since 2010, Mana Wynwood has been a cornerstone of Wynwood’s identity as Miami’s Arts and Entertainment District. Our
multi-use properties and event venues
have hosted thousands of events,
spanning the entire spectrum of cultural activities
. From art shows and music festivals to concerts, cultural celebrations, political rallies, business conferences, technology showcases, and charitable events, Mana Wynwood has been the backdrop for unforgettable experiences.
But Mana Wynwood is more than just a venue. It’s a canvas for artistic expression, showcasing
dozens of the largest and most prominent murals
and transforming the neighborhood into one of the world’s largest outdoor art museums. Artists from all corners of the globe are drawn to the large-scale canvas that Mana Wynwood provides, allowing them to bring their mural creations to life.
Our revitalization efforts have positioned Mana Wynwood as a top tourist destination in Miami and propelled the Wynwood neighborhood onto the world stage. Experience the transformative vision of Moishe Mana that has solidified Wynwood and made Mana Wynwood a pillar of cultural vibrancy and innovation.
